meanings.definition: The interior or central part of the digestive system in insects and some other invertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The midguts of insects help with digestion.
meanings.sent2: In biology class, we learned about the importance of midguts in insects.
meanings.sent3: The midguts of the tiny ant were working hard to process its food.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity led her to explore the intricate workings of the midguts in insects.
meanings.sent5: The scientist carefully studied the midguts under the microscope to understand their function better.

meanings.definition: The middle section of the digestive tract in certain animals.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian examined the midguts of the sick dog.
meanings.sent2: The midguts play a crucial role in the digestion process of animals.
meanings.sent3: The midguts of the cat seemed to be in a grumpy mood today.
meanings.sent4: The midguts of the horse worked tirelessly to break down the food.
meanings.sent5: The zookeeper carefully monitored the midguts of the animals to ensure their health.
